imdb.plot outline: Travelling Unplugged is a reality television series that follows the adventures of Byron Taylor; a young filmmaker from South Africa. When he was 17 he had just finished high school, so with some cash saved up in hand and an eagerness to experience more of life, he set out by himself to travel around the world for a year. With his camera in hand, he captures and shares his entire journey.
imdb.title: Travelling Unplugged
plot: _Travelling Unplugged_ (qv) is a reality television series that follows the adventures of Byron Taylor; a young filmmaker from South Africa. When he was 17 he had just finished high school, so with some cash saved up in hand and an eagerness to experience more of life, he set out by himself to travel around the world for a year. With his camera in hand, he captures and shares his entire journey.::Meagan Buys
